title: Qredible, Inc.
description:
Qredible, Inc. builds enterprise compliance management software, Quality Management Systems (QMS), and supply chain automation for highly regulated industries like CBD, nutraceuticals, hemp, cannabis, supplements, and peptides. Qredible's compliance-driven regulatory technology services connect your entire supply chain for safer digital commerce. Our unique software ecosystem automates compliance monitoring, COA management, integrates high-risk payment processors, offers AI-powered 24/7 risk management and audit management, and enables blockchain-secured business verification for your regulators and financial partners.

Businesses use our Q-Trust blockchain-secured digital registry of compliance data to speed up due diligence and readily identify reliable and quality CBD, hemp, hemp-derived, and other high-risk products. We enable transparency for: Hemp and Cannabis Growers, Manufacturers, Distributors, Wholesalers, and Retailers.

The automotive industry has CarFax to give the consumer unbiased information about the quality and safety of the product they may buy. The medical industry has the FDA to protect the consumer from unfounded product claims and mis-labeled products. Now the CBD, hemp, nutraceutical, supplements, and cannabis industries have Qredible. Our technology doesn't tell the supply chain partner or consumer what product to purchase, but we do provide validation and verification of the brand quality and product safety. If the brand or highly regulated product is Q-verified, then all parties can trust in the transaction.

Qredible's Q-Transact system (part of Q-Trust) is a high risk business e-commerce integrated compliance system. Highly regulated products can be deployed, sold, fulfilled, and managed online with the system. Our users can launch e-commerce storefronts in minutes with our proprietary, automated store builder. Q-Transact allows you to create compliant labels and 3D mockups. The Q-Transact APIs are designed to facilitate order fulfillment and shipment through the Q-Transact App for e-commerce businesses hosting their storefronts on platforms such as WooCommerce, Shopify, Wix, Magento, etc. In addition to accessing white-labeled product information in Q-Transact, these APIs also provide status updates for orders and shipments fulfilled by private label distributors on the Q-Transact's platform.

The Q-Monitor module within the Q-Trust platform is designed to enable the efficient tracking, monitoring, and management of counter-party risk. The system is currently implemented for banks, merchant card processors, and brands within the Cannabis and CBD / Hemp industries. However, the system monitors multiple company types (i.e., nutraceuticals) and is not just limited to CBD / Hemp and Cannabis brands. Q-Monitor eliminates manual tracking via automated monitoring of your websites and your inventory against products that are not permitted for sale in certain states, or in violation of your merchant processing or banking relationship. Advanced AI algorithms scan text, images, and audiovisual content across your digital marketing platforms seeking state-specific potential violations. Alerts occur in real-time helping your company avoid FDA letters, FTC fines, fees and penalties, and class-action litigation. Real-time analysis and automated monitoring ensure that your company or suppliers meet the complex regulatory burden of each state where you conduct business.

Qredible's product compliance, supply chain, and QMS platform serve: CBD, hemp, and cannabis, nutraceuticals and wellness supplements, hemp-derived products, pharmaceuticals, merchant banking, financial institutions, telehealth, healthcare and life sciences, medical devices, food and beverage, consumer products, construction, government and public sectors.

Qredible builds advanced compliance management software technology to help your highly regulated company protect your brand and grow your business via safer, trustworthy digital commerce.

title: WS Hampshire
description: WS Hampshire is a custom fabricator and producer of aeroponic grow boxes for use in indoor grow facilities. Our grow boxes are made from a highly specialized, opaque material that reflects all light back to the plants and does not allow light penetration into the root zone.
